0.0.1
- Alpha release

0.0.2
- Disable Menu drop down when only one app is availaible
- Add Select2 Widgets
- Change TabularInline sortable widget
- Add red background to delete-checkbox
- Create delete_selected_confirmation.html
- Disable Hover at table links

0.0.3
- Add support for django-object-actions

0.0.4
- Fix custom static files

0.0.5
- Code Cleanup 
- Add Milea Default Models
- Add Milea Configurations

0.0.6
- Add current-user-middleware to auto create user references to MileaModel
- Tabler Update to v.1.0.0-beta-20
- Add tom-select to multiple select
- Minor beauty corrections

0.0.7
- Minor beauty corrections
- Change Position of System Data in Default Model to the last position in the Container
- Add HTML Progressbar for progress fields
- Add Color Picker
